answers.answer: HiLet me come straight to the point. Undiagnosed fatigue/weakness with increased heart rate are basically symptoms of some underlying cause like overwork, poor sleep, worry, boredom, or lack of exercise, illness, such as a cold or the flu, anemia (low hemoglobin), hypothyroidism (low function of thyroid), diabetes etc. Please refer to:http://www.meritcare.com/hwdb/showtopic.aspx?module_abbrev=SYMPTOM&pd_hwid=wkfat&sec_hwid=hw90102The link gives the various reasons for your symptoms. It is just for your information. Please consult your physician at the earliest. It will be wise not to ignore such symptoms.Let me know what your doctors say. If you need more help, please feel free to contact. I’ll be happy to answer your queries. Please keep me posted.

question: while at work yesterday i was suddenly overcome with weakness my limbs felt heavy and sluggish just walking seemed to be to much and my heart rate speed up and this is not the first time it happened.  do anyone know whats wrong with me?
title: weakness
